title: LoL logo shows, but launcher doesn't load - HELP!
body:
So I'm running Direct X 11 on windows 8.1 and I can't get the launcher to load. I've tried a lot of stuff:

1. deleting the lol.launcher and launching the shortcut as administrator
2. launching lol.exe as administrator
3. restarting computer
4. reset modem/router

What else can I do? I've been trying to figure this out for awhile now. The logo loads, sits on my screen for 3 minutes, and then goes away and the launcher doesn't load. Please help me.

replies.body:
It sounds like it's having a tough time even reaching our servers. I suspect this could be resolved by working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) since it covers a lot of common solutions for when your client can't link to us.

Let me know if those steps worked for you.
